name: The Lost Crystal Of Faelar
description:
On the mainland of Wistari, the crystal of Faelar has been stolen from the Elven Village. 

Your job?

Get it back.

Run through a sprawling and immersive world filled to the brim with content and adventure, epic battles, and indepth gameplay.

Travel across towns, fields and dungeons in your epic quest, battling monsters, collecting items, and levelling up your party.

All in... 

The Crystal Of Faelar!
